generation_parameters.business_idea: Family-owned pet grooming service with mobile grooming vans serving suburban neighborhoods

website_structure.purpose: Convert pet owners into mobile grooming clients

sections.headline: Professional Pet Grooming at Your Doorstep
sections.subheadline: Stress-free grooming services in our fully-equipped mobile salon

items.title: Convenient Mobile Service
items.description: We come to you - no travel stress for your pet

items.title: Personalized Care
items.description: Custom grooming plans for your pet's needs

testimonials.quote: The mobile service is perfect for my busy schedule. My golden retriever loves the groomer!
testimonials.author: Sarah Mitchell
testimonials.title: Dog Owner

sections.headline: Ready for a Stress-Free Grooming Experience?
sections.description: Book your first mobile grooming appointment and save 15%

homepage.seo_title: Mobile Pet Grooming Services | Sunshine Pet Grooming | [City Name]
homepage.meta_description: Professional mobile pet grooming services bringing convenience to your doorstep. Certified groomers, stress-free experience, serving [Region].

hero.headline: Professional Pet Grooming That Comes to You
hero.subheadline: Expert mobile grooming services for dogs and cats in the comfort of your driveway
hero.hero_copy: Family-owned, fully equipped mobile salon serving your neighborhood

features.title: Full-Service Mobile Grooming
features.description: Complete grooming services in our state-of-the-art mobile salon
features.benefit: No travel stress for your pet

faq.question: How long does a mobile grooming session take?
faq.answer: Most appointments take 1-2 hours, depending on your pet's size and service needs

tone_of_voice.writing_style: Warm, professional, and reassuring with pet-loving personality

visual_style.imagery_style: Happy pets, professional groomers, clean mobile facilities

seo_recommendations.content_strategy: Focus on local service areas and mobile convenience benefits
seo_recommendations.local_seo: Create Google Business Profile, target neighborhood-specific keywords
